birth_place.zh-cn: 大明北直隶顺天府紫禁城
birth_place.en: Forbidden City, Shuntian Prefecture, North Zhili, Ming Dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 大明北直隶顺天府万岁山
death_place.en: Wansui Hill, Shuntian Prefecture, North Zhili, Ming Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 中国明朝末代皇帝，明光宗第五子，明熹宗异母弟。年号“崇祯”。在位期间，内忧外患，民变不断，后金政权虎视眈眈。1644年，李自成攻破北京，于煤山自缢殉国，明朝灭亡。
description.en: The last emperor of the Ming dynasty in China, the fifth son of the Taichang Emperor and the younger half-brother of the Tianqi Emperor. His reign name was 'Chongzhen'. His reign was plagued by internal rebellions and external threats, particularly from the Later Jin regime. In 1644, after Li Zicheng's rebel forces captured Beijing, he committed suicide at Meishan, leading to the fall of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十六位皇帝，崇祯帝的异母兄长。
description.en: The 16th emperor of the Ming dynasty, older half-brother of the Chongzhen Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十五位皇帝，崇祯帝与明熹宗的父亲。
description.en: The 15th emperor of the Ming dynasty, father of the Chongzhen and Tianqi Emperors.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝的生母，被明光宗下令杖杀。
description.en: The biological mother of the Chongzhen Emperor, who was ordered to be beaten to death by the Taichang Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明光宗的妃嫔，崇祯帝的庶母，曾抚养年幼的崇祯帝。
description.en: A consort of the Taichang Emperor and a surrogate mother to the Chongzhen Emperor, who raised him for a period in his youth.

description.zh-cn: 明光宗的妃嫔，崇祯帝的庶母，曾抚养崇祯帝至成人。
description.en: A consort of the Taichang Emperor and a surrogate mother to the Chongzhen Emperor, who raised him to adulthood.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝的皇后，明朝灭亡时奉崇祯帝之命自尽。
description.en: The empress of the Chongzhen Emperor, who committed suicide at his command upon the fall of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明末农民起义军领袖，大顺政权建立者，其军队攻破北京导致明朝灭亡。
description.en: Leader of a peasant rebellion in the late Ming dynasty and founder of the Shun dynasty. His forces captured Beijing, leading to the collapse of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 指1644年（甲申年）李自成攻入北京，崇祯帝自缢，明朝灭亡的历史事件。
description.en: Refers to the historical events of 1644 (the Jiashen year), when Li Zicheng captured Beijing, the Chongzhen Emperor committed suicide, and the Ming dynasty fell.

description.zh-cn: 明末宦官，天启年间权倾朝野，在崇祯帝即位初期被铲除。
description.en: A powerful eunuch during the late Ming dynasty who dominated the court during the Tianqi era. He was purged early in the Chongzhen Emperor's reign.

description.zh-cn: 明末著名将领，曾督师蓟辽以抗击后金。后因己巳之变被崇祯帝以通敌罪处死。
description.en: A prominent general in the late Ming dynasty who commanded the northeastern frontier against the Later Jin. He was later executed by the Chongzhen Emperor on charges of treason following the Jisi Incident.

description.zh-cn: 明末将领，驻守皮岛牵制后金，后被袁崇焕以尚方宝剑斩杀。
description.en: A late Ming dynasty general stationed on Pidao to harass the Later Jin, who was later executed by Yuan Chonghuan using the imperial sword of authority.

description.zh-cn: 后金军在1629年绕道蒙古，突破长城攻入明朝京畿地区的军事事件。此事导致袁崇焕被崇祯帝问罪处死。
description.en: A military event in 1629 where Later Jin forces bypassed the Great Wall via Mongolia to invade the capital region of the Ming dynasty. This incident led to the Chongzhen Emperor arresting and executing Yuan Chonghuan.

description.zh-cn: 清朝的前身，由女真首领努尔哈赤建立的政权，是明朝末期的主要外部威胁。
description.en: The predecessor to the Qing dynasty, a state established by the Jurchen leader Nurhaci, which was the primary external threat to the Ming dynasty in its final years.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由汉族建立的最后一个大一统王朝，于1644年被李自成所灭。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China ruled by ethnic Han Chinese, which was overthrown by Li Zicheng in 1644.

description.zh-cn: 南明政权的第一位皇帝，在明朝灭亡后继位。
description.en: The first emperor of the Southern Ming regime, who ascended the throne after the fall of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝入关后的第一位皇帝。
description.en: The first emperor of the Qing dynasty to rule over China proper.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个封建王朝，取代了明朝的统治。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, which replaced the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝灭亡后，由明朝宗室在南方建立的系列抵抗政权。
description.en: A series of loyalist regimes established by Ming dynasty princes in southern China after the fall of the Ming.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝的嫡长子，明朝太子。北京城陷后下落不明。
description.en: The eldest son and crown prince of the Chongzhen Emperor. His whereabouts became unknown after the fall of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝的贵妃。明朝灭亡时奉命自缢未死，被崇祯帝砍伤，后由清廷赡养。
description.en: A noble consort of the Chongzhen Emperor. During the fall of the Ming, she survived a suicide attempt ordered by the emperor and was subsequently wounded by him. She was later cared for by the Qing court.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝的女儿。明朝灭亡时被崇祯帝砍断手臂，但幸存下来。
description.en: A daughter of the Chongzhen Emperor. Her arm was severed by her father during the fall of the Ming dynasty, but she survived.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝的女儿，明朝灭亡时被崇祯帝亲手杀死。
description.en: A daughter of the Chongzhen Emperor, who was killed by her father during the fall of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明末司礼监秉笔太监，在崇祯帝自缢后，随之殉国。
description.en: A directorate of ceremonial scribe eunuch in the late Ming dynasty who committed suicide after the Chongzhen Emperor hanged himself.

description.zh-cn: 明清两代的皇家宫殿，位于北京。
description.en: The imperial palace of the Ming and Qing dynasties, located in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的皇家园林，明代时称万岁山。崇祯帝在此自缢殉国。
description.en: A royal park in Beijing, known as Wansui Hill during the Ming dynasty. It is the site where the Chongzhen Emperor committed suicide by hanging.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝朱由检是明光宗朱常洛的第五子。
description.en: The Chongzhen Emperor, Zhu Youjian, was the fifth son of the Taichang Emperor, Zhu Changluo.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝的生母是孝纯皇太后刘氏。
description.en: The Chongzhen Emperor's biological mother was Empress Dowager Xiaochun, née Liu.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝五岁时，其母刘氏被其父明光宗下令杖杀。
description.en: When the Chongzhen Emperor was five years old, his mother, Lady Liu, was ordered to be beaten to death by his father, the Taichang Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝是明熹宗的异母弟。
description.en: The Chongzhen Emperor was the younger half-brother of the Tianqi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 庄烈愍皇后周氏是崇祯帝的皇后。
description.en: Empress Zhuangliemin, née Zhou, was the empress consort of the Chongzhen Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 朱慈烺是崇祯帝的嫡长子。
description.en: Zhu Cilang was the eldest legitimate son of the Chongzhen Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 朱慈烺是庄烈愍皇后周氏所生。
description.en: Zhu Cilang was born to Empress Zhuangliemin, née Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 在生母刘氏被杖杀后，年幼的崇祯帝交由庶母西李（李康妃）抚养。
description.en: After his biological mother, Lady Liu, was beaten to death, the young Chongzhen Emperor was raised by his surrogate mother, West Li (Consort Kang).

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝后改由另一庶母东李（李庄妃）抚养至成人。
description.en: The Chongzhen Emperor was later raised to adulthood by another surrogate mother, East Li (Consort Zhuang).

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝是明朝的最后一位皇帝。
description.en: The Chongzhen Emperor was the last emperor of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝即位后，大力铲除阉党，将魏忠贤贬至凤阳，魏忠贤最终在途中自缢而亡。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Chongzhen Emperor moved to eradicate the eunuch faction, banishing Wei Zhongxian to Fengyang. Wei ultimately committed suicide en route.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝起用袁崇焕为兵部尚书，督师蓟辽，托付其收复全辽的重任。
description.en: The Chongzhen Emperor appointed Yuan Chonghuan as Minister of War to oversee the Jiliao military region, entrusting him with the crucial task of recovering all of Liaodong.

description.zh-cn: 为裁兵减饷，袁崇焕在得到内阁大臣钱龙锡默许下，诛杀了将领毛文龙。
description.en: In order to reduce troops and cut military expenses, Yuan Chonghuan executed General Mao Wenlong with the tacit approval of Grand Secretary Qian Longxi.

description.zh-cn: 后金军队绕道蒙古突破边关，入侵京畿地区，引发己巳之变。
description.en: Later Jin forces bypassed the frontier defenses via Mongolia and invaded the capital region, triggering the Jisi Incident.

description.zh-cn: 己巳之变中后金军队兵临城下，使京城百姓和大臣埋怨诽谤袁崇焕，最终导致崇祯帝在暴怒下受反间计煽动而处死袁崇焕。
description.en: During the Jisi Incident, the Later Jin army besieged the capital, causing citizens and officials to blame and slander Yuan Chonghuan, which ultimately led the enraged Chongzhen Emperor, incited by a disinformation plot, to execute him.

description.zh-cn: 在己巳之变后，崇祯帝受后金反间计及朝臣诽谤影响，将袁崇焕下狱，并于次年处死。
description.en: After the Jisi Incident, influenced by a Later Jin disinformation plot and slander from court officials, the Chongzhen Emperor imprisoned Yuan Chonghuan and had him executed the following year.

description.zh-cn: 李自成率领的起义军攻破北京，直接导致了甲申之变和明朝的灭亡。
description.en: The rebel army led by Li Zicheng captured Beijing, directly causing the Jiashen Incident and the fall of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在李自成攻破北京后，崇祯帝于煤山自缢殉国。
description.en: After Li Zicheng captured Beijing, the Chongzhen Emperor committed suicide by hanging himself at Meishan (Coal Hill).

description.zh-cn: 北京城破前夕，崇祯帝逼迫皇后周氏自杀。
description.en: On the eve of Beijing's fall, the Chongzhen Emperor forced Empress Zhou to commit suicide.

description.zh-cn: 北京城破前夕，崇祯帝命袁贵妃自缢未果后，拔剑将其砍伤。
description.en: On the eve of Beijing's fall, after Noble Consort Yuan failed to hang herself as ordered, the Chongzhen Emperor drew his sword and wounded her.

description.zh-cn: 北京城破前夕，崇祯帝挥剑砍伤长平公主，致其左臂被断。
description.en: On the eve of Beijing's fall, the Chongzhen Emperor swung his sword at Princess Changping, severing her left arm.

description.zh-cn: 北京城破前夕，崇祯帝亲手砍杀了昭仁公主。
description.en: On the eve of Beijing's fall, the Chongzhen Emperor personally killed Princess Zhaoren by hacking her with his sword.

description.zh-cn: 王承恩是陪伴崇祯帝在景山自缢的唯一随侍，随后亦自缢殉国。
description.en: Wang Cheng'en was the only attendant accompanying the Chongzhen Emperor when he committed suicide in Jingshan, and he subsequently hanged himself in loyalty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝顺治帝入关后，为崇祯帝发丧并营建思陵，给予其庙号和谥号。
description.en: After entering China proper, Emperor Shunzhi of the Qing dynasty held a state funeral for the Chongzhen Emperor, constructed the Siling Mausoleum for him, and granted him a temple name and posthumous titles.
